yelp_reviews.author: John S.
yelp_reviews.review: Apartments are not maintained at all. Management lies about everything and is slow to respond to problems. Lied about laundry machines not being coin operated(they are). Mold grows in the attic and they blame you for all of it. Ventilation fans do not work adequately. Bathroom was not sealed properly and led to water damage, which was blamed on me.  Management is very threatening and manipulative. Witnessed them perform unwanted door unlocks on other tenants and billing them for it. You will not get your deposit back no matter how much you clean. In fact they will invent anything they can to scam you for money as you leave. Hire a licensed mold inspector to come in before you leave. You will need it.

yelp_reviews.author: Edward A.
yelp_reviews.review:
when we moved here two years ago, there was an excellent manager and an outstanding maintenance man.  both are gone now. the grounds and the apartments themselves have deteriorated.  the owners do not care about the welfare of the tenants.  these apartments do not have central heat or air. they are hot in the summer and very cold in the winter.  now that the maintenance man has quit (a significant loss) it is difficult to have a work order filled.  I would not recommend this place to anyone.

summary.text:
Good

Unfortunately, user reviews indicate a scarcity of positive experiences at The Village Apartments. Most reviewers reflect on serious issues pertaining to management and maintenance. The brief mention of how it used to be well-managed in the past highlights that there may have been a time when living conditions were satisfactory, but that appears to be a distant memory.

Great

This article highlights the lack of experiences that would typically be categorized as "great" in relation to The Village Apartments. User reviews overwhelmingly showcase dissatisfaction, with no reviewer providing positive remarks or noteworthy experiences that could contribute to a "great" rating. It seems that the potential for excellence was overshadowed by prevailing negative sentiments.

Bad

The bad experiences at The Village Apartments are alarming and plentiful. Users express severe disappointment with the management, specifically mentioning their negligence towards maintenance and their dismissive attitudes. Complaints regarding mold issues, improper insulation, and unresponsive maintenance requests paint a troubling picture of the property. Additionally, tenants have reported that the management is slow to react and often manipulative, contributing to an environment of distrust.

Ugly

The ugly reality at The Village Apartments is encapsulated by numerous user reviews detailing unethical management practices. Several tenants report the deposition of security deposits being unjustly withheld, with management allegedly fabricating complaints to justify their actions. The pervasive presence of mold, lack of fundamental maintenance, and reports of threatening behavior by management create an environment that can only be described as neglectful. One reviewer even reported witnessing management unlock doors without consent, further solidifying the toxic atmosphere. Overall, the properties are described in such terms that lead to labeling the management as a "slumlord."
